ααα ex_infinito ααα
αααααααααααααααααα

One man, many machines.
Mixed-media digital art.

================

Inspired by thought and stories of creation.

===
First: An idea was imprinted in my mind through thought and thinking.

Second: That idea transformed into a vision through imagination.

Third: Imagination drove introspection and fueled external motion.

Fourth: External motion lead to experimentation and curious action.

Fifth: Curios action resulted in manifestation ... 

==
ex_infinito was created using a blend of technological devices and machines.

Sounds we're captured via an iPhone. 

They were brought into Ableton where audio production techniques were applied prior to equalization and output. 

Concurrently machine learning algorithms were producing the base animation from a seed phrase inspired by the books of creation. 

Resulting in all outputs being compiled in Photoshop and finally rendered to the final output.
